messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] drugs toward the south??
messages.msgSnippet: ... toward ... I can t remember what they are, but there are meds we can get here that you guys can t.  I hear about people coming up here to buy them. Tia
messages.messageBody:
>
> And when we can't legally get some sorts of medical help here, we go to
> Mexico.
>
> And I guess whatever they can't get legally in Mexico, Mexicans get from
> Colombia!
>
> <g>
>
> Doesn't Europe work that way, kind of north down too? (Or maybe just
toward
> Amsterdam.)

I can't remember what they are, but there are meds we can get here that you
guys can't. I hear about people coming up here to buy them.
Tia

"They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary
saftety deserve neither liberty nor safety." Ben Franklin
leschke@...

messages.subject: drugs toward the south??
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/25/03 10:35:08 AM, tmthomas@shaw.ca writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/25/03 10:35:08 AM, tmthomas@... writes:

<< Tia, We use melatonin. Check out a naturopath. That is where we have
found it. They get it prescribed from a doctor in the US.
>>

Wow!

And when we can't legally get some sorts of medical help here, we go to
Mexico.

And I guess whatever they can't get legally in Mexico, Mexicans get from
Colombia!

<g>

Doesn't Europe work that way, kind of north down too? (Or maybe just toward
Amsterdam.)

Sandra
